data.suggestion: 15 years in the future, an older, grizzled Keith drinks away his sorrows at a tavern/bar crying about how he couldn't save Alaric or Laura and now Natani.
(wolf) Raine goddess of the hunt.
A Re-Draw of Keidran Trace- 'Sit': Tigress Trace Edition
Kathrin cheering up Mike after a bad day on Eric's boat.
Natani takes Flora's idea and tries to create a bust chart filled with characters that make her bust look smaller instead of looking bigger.
Keith and Laura fiery tango dance.
Kat's Fight Training sequel: Zen walks in to find Natani unconscious on the floor having been knocked out in one punch by Kathrin.
What if Trace fell in love with Laura instead of Flora?
Princess Reni meeting Clovis
Sam asks Colin for help getting a book from a high shelf. Much to her surprise, Colin helps by lifting Sam up instead of getting the book down.
Sythe, Maren, Trace, and Flora swap bodies
Zen and Raine cuddling on a couch under a blanket
Magic Lesson Mishap! Nora tries to teach a young Reni how to use magic, and Reni accidentally turns a fearsome mystical creature into a certain familiar squirrel
Brutus asks Clovis when his wonderful sister will come again. Clovis replies that she will never come again. Brutus is saddened and Clovis add: "...but I'm not sure".
Adira teaching human adventurer how to court male snow leopards.
A young Keith surprises himself and Alaric by beating him in a sparing match.
While practicing shifting between human and wolf, Raine accidentally turns herself into a guy (human or Keidran)
Reni(human form) Ref Sheet
The main cast dressed up as Disney Princesses, including from Marvel and Star Wars. All female.
In her dreams, Princess Clovis ends up in hell and meets Loona - a hellhound from the "Helluva Boss" animation (by Vivienne Medrano).
Reference Sheet Madelyn
Nora going around the house, swapping couple's for valentines day!
An angry Raine (in her halfway form) shouts at Euchre and Mary for abandoning and neglecting her respectively, and declares that she is proud of who she is.
FemKeith and Keith Bathtime.

Mike meets Carver, and tries to warn him about repeated gender-swaps that happen in the sketch world. Carver is dismissive and disbelieving, so Nora decides to give Carver a demonstration and transforms him.
Mike puts the finishing touches on his Na’Rella scale model / ship in a bottle. It catches fire as soon as he places it down to inspect his handiwork.
Maren reference sheet including a shot of her cat form.
Feline Maren Dakimakura
Natani as a 1950s roller skating car hop waitress.
Good Morning Flora, Kat version
Legosi and Haru from “Beastars” slow dancing.
Nibbly on Keith's head tugging at his ears, controlling him Ratatouille-style. Keith is being forced to walk out the door in just a towel, and it's slipping. Natani's too busy laughing to help.
Dark Trace force to relive the memories of 2012 mistletoe incident
Flora asks Trace for a hair cut. Trace uses a spell but the spell does not distinguish between hair and fur.
Trace trys to fly a kite in the wind, meanwhile Flora and Kathrin are swatting at the tail of the kite trying to pounce on it.
Family Valentine: Trace and Flora sharing the love with their unborn child
How would the fight between Trace and Mary have gone if she had somehow reflected his spell back at him?

On Valentine's day, Keith and Natani take a romantic boat ride. However, Natani does not quite understand how it works, so instead she tries to overtake other boats with couples and be the first at finish line.
Nib Nab 4: Clovis and Brutus
A desparate, coffee deprived Landen brawls with an enthusiastic King Adelaide over who's first in line at the local coffee shop.
Fluffy Winter Keith and Fluffy Winter Natani snuggle up and get cozy during a snowstorm
Grand Templar Mary Siverlock learns that Eris has broken into a Keidran village where a peace agreement has been made and is not happy about it
Flora's magic mishaps half human transformation
Natani, out of character, chest-to-chest up against Kathrin, who is looking flustered and confused. Out of Natani's back is a Valentine arrow.
The Explorers enjoy watching the Tiger tribe ceremonial party celebrating the new year. With a Tigress and the Noble Tigress wanting them to dance with them.
A Husky Keidran in a wintry forest.
The main cast dressed as the cast of Bravely Default (Trace=Tiz, Flora=Agnes, Keith=Ringabel, Natani=Edea)
Kat meets the triplets from the Dragon Masquerade and they admire each other’s tailoring skills.
Sequel to Fallout Mekkan sketch in which Flora, Trace, Deathclaw Nora, and Keith explore the Sierra Madre and find Hologram Laura
Madelyn Reference Sheet
Trace Scuba diving with shark girls
Transformation lapse of Raine
Flora(Ori) and the Blind Forest
Clovis and Brutus order pizza at Tom's. When reading the menu Brutus cant make up his mind, and Clovis impatiently make the choice for him.
One of Reni's previous failed attempts at making a human form, with Nora providing critique
Magical Boy Keith turning Natani into the manliest wolf ever
Pin Up: A Victorian Basitin lady raises her skirts just enough to show of her ankles.
A blushing Trace sitting down on a throne, surrounded by Flora, Maren, Karen, Saria, and humanoid Nora looking at him tenderly. (AKA Harem King Trace)
The story of how Mike got his scar. What does Erilas (Evals's sis) think of it?
Trace gives Flora's belly a loving kiss
Keith proposing to Laura
Adelaide in the "It's like I'm wearing nothing at all" pose
Nib Nab 4: Now Flora and Trace.

Doggy Dragon. Nora gets a taste of her own medicine when one fateful prank hits a mirror, flinging a dog's mind back into herself. Oops! Suddenly her powerful dragon body obeys the dog, ignores her, and begins acting like a giant silly puppy.
Mrs. Nibbly in her dragon hoard of stolen underwear.
Zen and Natani as Mandalorians
Merveille Million from Solatorobo
Reni tests out her magic spells on Evals and Mike and she accidentally turns them to humans.
Mike and Evals having some alone time at the Oasis
"Dog commands? From Rose? What, like sit?" Maren asks. To both their surprise, (wolf)Raine immediately sits. The commands still work!
Maeve Noms Roan’s Tail, causing him to either have a heart attack because he nearly killed someone so adorable, or throw his fireball vertically, causing it to land on him.
Raine (human) and Maren both in their swimsuits (as seen in recent chapters), with Maren pulling Raine in closer for a ‘better’ pose.
Maddie and older Maeve visiting a spa and looking over the offered services. Maddie becomes scandalized (and curious) at hearing what a pedicure is.
Chaos summons Florida Man! The balance between order and chaos on Mekkan shifts to become overwhelmingly chaotic.
Eric get's feedback on his suggestions from the crew
Adelaide finds a suspiciously iconic, vaguely familiar Norse hammer and decides she likes it enough to bring it home
Our northern explorer sinks chest deep in snow. The snow leopards have a laugh, as their large paws prevent such things
Valentine special! Trace and Flora
Current Maddie is down about not have been able to woo Keith, and so enjoys summoned sweets for v-day with Karen.
Girls Beach Volleyball gets outta control! Trace gets beaned on the sidelines.
Legosi and haru from beastars dancing together
Evals whereing a dog muzzle at a park near a sign.
Sequel to Defending the Boss. After the healer tells Clovis of a severely injured Brutus' grim prognosis, Clovis issues a chilling ultimatum. "If he's no longer useful to me, then neither are you."
Kathrin tied to the ground with threads, à la Gulliver's Travels, after Nora makes the puppets of her friends come to life.
Natani stumbles upon Zen and Keith having a dance off. Complete with disco attire, and Earth, Wind and Fire.
Some of the gang looking through sketch suggestions that were never used and talking about the more “interesting” ones that have their own separate pile
[Cosplay] Maren as Carmen Sandiego.
Trace asks Flora if he's getting fat. Flora responds with teasing that he is and it's all part of her nefarious plan to fatten him up into... the dad bod.
Kathrin as barman cheering and pouring a drink
